resources.string: Please fill those fields before continuing:
What to eat during coronavirus times?

There is no special food that will protect you from getting infected - however you can avoid sabotaging your immune system by avoiding alcohol and junk food. \n\n Abstain from smoking - it seems that COVID-19 infection affects lungs.
Try to focus on eating healthy food that is not energy dense.
You are underweight - you might want to eat a little bit more that you require to keep stable weight.
Your weight is normal - keep it up!
You are overweight - you might want to eat a little bit less than you require and add some more exercise to your daily schedule.
You are obese - please consult a health professional.
